personal.tagline: Artificial Intelligence | Advanced Technologies | Space | Defence

bio: Welcome to my corner of the digital universe. I'm passionate about pushing the boundaries of what's possible at the convergence of cutting-edge technologies.
With a focus on artificial intelligence, space exploration, and defence systems, I work on projects that shape the future of humanity's technological frontier.

focusAreas.title: Artificial Intelligence
focusAreas.description: Machine learning, neural networks, and autonomous systems

focusAreas.title: Advanced Technologies
focusAreas.description: Emerging tech, quantum computing, and next-gen systems

focusAreas.title: Space
focusAreas.description: Satellite systems, space exploration, and orbital mechanics

focusAreas.title: Defence
focusAreas.description: Security systems, strategic technology, and protection

projects.title: CISERES
projects.description: AI-enabled satellite capability for disaster management that turns EO data into near real-time alerts for faster response.

projects.title: ExoMars "Rosalind Franklin" Rover
projects.description: European rover for Mars exploration, equipped with advanced sensing and decision-making capabilities to navigate the harsh Martian environment.

projects.title: MoonNet
projects.description: First would-beAI to run on the Moon: Deep-learning inference payload intended to run on a lunar mission, demonstrating on-board AI processing for spaceflight imagery.

projects.title: Canadarm2 (International Space Station)
projects.description: NASA and Canadian Space Agency led International Space Station robotics program work focused on logistics and support engineering for a flight-proven robotic system.

projects.title: OpenSAR Insight
projects.description: European Space Agency project to develop AI algorithms for Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) data analysis to detect and classify objects in Earth observation imagery.

projects.title: F-35 Joint Strike Fighter
projects.description: Power and Thermal Management System (PTMS) engineering for the F-35, supporting reliable electrical power distribution and thermal performance in a safety-critical fighter aircraft environment.

footer.tagline: Built using Claude Code, Cursor, and other Generative AI tools.
